title: Polymerized ionic liquid Co-catalysts driving photocatalytic CO2 transformation
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00194J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lisa Eisele, Bletë Hulaj, Maximilian Podsednik, Francesco Laudani, Pablo Ayala, Alexey Cherevan, Annette Foelske, Andreas Limbeck, Dominik Eder, Katharina Bica-Schröder
An ionic liquid polymeric matrix is used to immobilize a ruthenium photosensitizer and rhenium catalyst for selective CO2 reduction to CO.
